hero.title: Analyze Your Billboard's
hero.subtitle: AI-powered billboard analysis for optimal advertising effectiveness. Get comprehensive readability scores and actionable insights instantly.
hero.tagline: Instant clarity. Actionable insights. No more guesswork.

features.title: Everything You Need for
features.subtitle: Our AI-powered platform provides comprehensive analysis tools to maximize your billboard's impact and ROI.

instant.title: Instant Results
instant.description: AI-powered scoring (0-100) delivers comprehensive analysis in seconds, not days.

distance.title: Distance Analysis
distance.description: Test readability at multiple viewing distances: 50m, 100m, and 150m for complete coverage.

reports.title: Professional Reports
reports.description: Get actionable suggestions with detailed PDF reports you can share with clients.

location.title: Location Insights
location.description: Factor in geographic and demographic considerations for optimal placement strategy.

pricing.title: Choose Your Perfect Plan
pricing.subtitle: Start optimizing your billboard campaigns today with our flexible pricing options.

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Perfect for small agencies and freelancers

login.title: Welcome Back
login.subtitle: Sign in to your Billboard Analyzer account

messages.loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
messages.accountCreationFailed: Account creation failed. Please try again.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.welcome: Welcome back, {{name}}! Ready to analyze your billboard?

upload.title: Upload Your Billboard Creative
upload.supports: Supports JPG, PNG, MP4 files up to 50MB

location.addressPlaceholder: Enter billboard location (e.g., Sultan Qaboos Street, Muscat)
location.helpText: Start typing to see suggestions, or click the navigation icon to use your current location

history.title: Analysis History
history.firstAnalysis: Upload your first billboard to get started

progress.title: Analyzing Your Billboard
progress.subtitle: Our AI is examining your creative for optimal readability

recommendations.arabicPercentage: Ensure Arabic text occupies at least 60% of billboard space per MTCIT guidelines
recommendations.trademark: Verify trademark compliance with Oman IP regulations

errors.fileRequired: Please select an image file (JPG, PNG) or video file (MP4) to analyze.
errors.fileTooLarge: File size must be less than 50MB.
errors.invalidFileType: Please upload a JPG, PNG, or MP4 file.
errors.analysisLimitReached: Monthly analysis limit reached. Please upgrade your plan.
errors.locationNotFound: Location not found. Please check the address and try again.
errors.apiError: Analysis failed. Please try again or contact support if the issue persists.
